name: nourished
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
nourish
to provide people or living things with food in order to make them grow and keep them healthy: Children need plenty of good fresh food to nourish them. She looks happy and well nourished. This cream is supposed to help nourish your skin.
formal If you nourish a feeling, belief, or plan, you think about it a lot and encourage it: Lisa has long nourished the hope of becoming a famous writer.
